item.title: [Diablo 4] Ancestral Unique Item [FlameScar] Info
item.description: [Ancestral Unique Wand] FlameScar link 925 Item Power 1,838 Damage Per Second [1,226 - 1,838] Damage per Hit 1.20 Attacks per Second (Very Fast) +130 Life On Hit Lucky Hit: Up to a 40% Chance to Deal +6,000 Fire Damage +[153 - 225] Intelligence +[8.0 - 10.0]% Lucky Hit Chance +[28.5 - 37.5]% Incinerate Size (Sorcerer Only) +[4 - 6] to Incinerate (Sorcerer Only) Requires Level: 79 While Channeling Incinerate, you periodically shoot embers that are attracted to enemies, each dealing [3,676 - 7,352] Fire damage.
